title: SPECIAL PREVIEW - Up On Game - Hour 1 - Debate On Sha'Carri Richardson's Marijuana Suspension
itunes:title: SPECIAL PREVIEW - Up On Game - Hour 1 - Debate On Sha'Carri Richardson's Marijuana Suspension
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh, and Plaxico Burress react to US Sprinter Sha'Carri Richardson being suspended for much of the Olympics after testing positive for marijuana. The guys debate the standing and purpose of the rule and whether Richardson is receiving fair treatment. The guys take calls from around the country on Richardson's suspension and the US Track and Field's handling of the situation.

Subscribe, rate and review the Up On Game podcast here!
